        • jumeg.connectivity.causality.make_frequency_bands

    jumeg.connectivity.causality.make_frequency_bands¶

    jumeg.connectivity.causality.make_frequency_bands(cau, freqs, sfreq)¶

    Average connectivity/causality matrix across given frequency bands.

    Parameters cau: array (n_nodes, n_nodes, n_freqs) sfreq: Sampling frequency freqs: Frequency bands

    e.g. [(4, 8), (8, 12), (12, 18), (18, 30), (30, 45)]

    Return cau_array: array (n_bands, n_nodes, n_nodes)
